text:
Supra, Hiroki Kikuta composed this tracks for Soul Calibur V, all of them are fantastic and have a resemblance with some tracks of Seiken Densetsu. 

The Invincible Blade
Tread Ye the Path of Bravery
Where Springs Not Fail
Wings of Sorrow
Wandering Seer
Amid the Pure Insanity
Samsara: The Wheel of Eternity
Adorned With Evil
Regalia

text:
Continuity done killed the series. I'd say a reboot is in order, especially after that godawful mess Dawn of Mana.

A more mature storyline, an art style that brings the characters into the modern era, and for the love of god, give us online multiplayer. Cause nothing beat the days of playing Legend of Mana with friends.

author: SupraDarky

text:
This soundtrack really had a full sound to it. I heard Kikuta contributed to the Soul Calibur 5 soundtrack so I'm looking forward to checking it out.

I'm still sad about the state of this series, which is pretty much dead now. Secret of Mana is one of my favorite games of all time, and this game is awesome as well.
author: SupraDarky
